phrs.translation: 技术爱好者, 喜欢科技的人

sentences.sentence: Arthur Antin is my 83 - year - old technophile grandfather.
sentences.translation: 亚瑟·昂丹是我八十三岁的祖父，一名技术兴趣者。

sentences.sentence: Even in technophile California people have started to resist smart meters.
sentences.translation: 即使是在技术之都的加利福尼亚，人们都开始排斥智能电表了。
